file_content.text: My observations of you are complete, organics. I have developed a winning strategy. Please stand by for termination.
Your continued survival defies numerous calculations. Your competitors did not make it this far.
Another impressive display, organics. I am carefully observing your tactics. This learning experience is most appreciated.
Stand by, organics. I am initiating Challenge Level Pulsar. You are not expected to survive. Farewell.
Well done, organics. Despite your lack of a battle strategy, you are still alive.
Greetings, organics. I am Annihilator Sixkay Aytoo. Your application for this competition is accepted. Please prepare for battle.
